alert.note: Alert for Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pima County through 415 PM MST... At 330 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Three Points, or 27 miles northwest of Green Valley, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Three Points, San Isidro, Kitt Peak, Picture Rocks, San Pedro, Santa Rosa Ranch and Pan Tak. This includes the following highways... Route 86 between mile markers 127 and 151. Route 286 between mile markers 39 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
